title: Robinhood stock is in a 'dumpster fire of a situation' right now, says retail trader - Yahoo Finance
content: Robinhood stock is in a 'dumpster fire of a situation' right now, says retail trader  Yahoo Finance
description: Robinhood stock has been on a downtrend since its IPO in July of last year. Amid Robinhood’s recent financial woes, finance YouTube channel host and retail trader Matt Kohrs believes the outlook is bleak for the company’s stock.
